Title: Enemies (2)
Plot: SG-1 finds themselves stranded in a crippled ship in a distant galaxy -- with Apophis threatening to destroy them. Teal'c is brainwashed and made loyal to Apophis once again.
Director: Martin Wood, Paul Mullie, Joseph Mallozzi, Robert C.
GuestStars: Carmen Argenziano, Thomas Milburn Jr., Jennifer Calvert, Dan Shea
